text: Pen abe, Klays binɨb ne pelpel apnan gɨpal okok, kɨli bɨ anɨb ak nop aglelak, chɨn ayɨp amɨl, mani dɨ nan gɨnɨgabal ak binɨb yɨmgeptek okok kɨlop ñɨnɨg dad amnɨgabun. Wog gɨnɨgabun anɨb ak, Bɨawl ne ke yɨb awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨmuŋ agɨl gɨnɨgabun. Pen binɨb okok kɨli abe nɨgɨnɨgabal, chɨn binɨb yɨmgeptek okok kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgun agɨl pel gos nopun.
